attributes.content: Hey. What's the situation?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Not too good. There's only a couple of devils left on the lower level...
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But they're all battle-hardened mercenaries, and horrible at that. Give them a single screw, and they'd come up with a hundred ways to kill you with it.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: In terms of combat ability, we're about even. In terms of numbers, we've only got half theirs.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Uh, do you have a but? I'm gonna lose all the feeling in my legs...
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yeah. 'But' the mercs are having some interteam strife. At least the bunch outside are. The ones below us right now, I'm not too sure.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You know that's not good news, right? Ugh, ow... that guy just now was a ruthless bastard...
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: If you've done emergency treatment, you're good. Think of something else for now, distract yourself.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...It's gotten hotter and hotter up above. Ever since just now, the action up there's gotten a little scary... and, uh, well, how do I put it? Makes it a little hard to breathe.
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I said distract yourself, not think about it all!
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Amiya. Amiya's alright, isn't she? And that Lungmen officer. Uh, I only met her once... but when I think about how they're dealing with... with... uh, what was it?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Give it a rest, you're starting to talk in tongues. Actually, you've lost plenty of blood—hold on, we've got news.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It's me. I'm nearly at ground level—
attributes.name: Panicked Voice

attributes.content: ...What's the situation? The enemy?
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Stroke of good luck. The Arts explosion just now at the top of the tower was like a volcano erupting. Engulfed the floor we were holding. We dispatched a few sentries in all the chaos, and the rest of them had to evacuate down to open ground—
attributes.name: Panicked Voice

attributes.content: I thought they'd be defending this place to the death...
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Maybe they all had a premonition of sorts. They all know, what's going on up there is beyond any 'tactical' level of foresight now—
attributes.name: Panicked Voice

attributes.content: Wait... what's going on! ?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wha—
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Grab on to me!
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wait... the—the fire's spreading?! What the hell's even flammable here?!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: High heat... It's just like the intel said, this is Talulah's doing...!
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Quit standing there! What do we do now?!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Oh—let's go this way, join up with everyone else! Wait up, is your leg okay now?!
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Distracting myself!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Confirm all comms! For the time being, no casualties!
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Calm your hustle. Those mercs haven't gone far. They're confirming the situation, prying for opportunities...
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Command tower got caught up in a sudden explosion at the top, and now it's fallen into... momentary peace.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What part of this screams peace to you?! A—Amiya's group are okay, right?
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mm... well, with that going on at the tower top, I'd say we're practically the picture of peace.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: F... finally—!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Don't drop your guard, we're still—
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: W—why'd you go mute? Hello—?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What's so interesting about the sky? Is something going on at the tower...?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Wait, i—is that an... orb of light? A ball... a ball of fire? A halo? What IS that?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Arts.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Arts?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Ah! I've been making a record. Since the start, that first huge sound, the flames and heated airstreams have burst through the building's dome. From beneath the tower, to the naked eye, it looks like...
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Like the afterglow of the setting sun.
Like the death of Infected as successive as the waves.
Like rage.
Like this city placed in ruin.
...I don't think I'm particularly perceptive compared to the rest of you, but I know more or less what you want to say here, really.
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: That'd be the leader of Reunion's...
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Heat and flame.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: But heat and flame... shouldn't be things so fearful.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Mm. That ball of light. That's one... two people's. No, perhaps even more than that, even more rage...
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So that's... Talulah?
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: It isn't. Or put another way, it's not just her. Not by far. Everyone knows the leader of Reunion as the intel described her, but I can't draw a line between that young little dragon and what I'm seeing now at all...
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Just what... just what happened up there?
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Amiya...
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Is there anyone else in the command tower?!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Yes!
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Then we need to go help them!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wait! Keep your head down!
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: —Enemies have left the command tower! Go find them!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Block this place off. Don't give them the chance to seek aid.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Wh—what do we do now?!
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Maybe we should go back and help Amiya—
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: —No.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Only Amiya... Only Amiya can do this. She can. I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I believe in her. That's the only reason I have for standing here now.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: And...
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: And she promised me. On my next paid leave, she'd tag along with me to hit the streets... and no leader's allowed to eat their words.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Okay.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Then until Amiya comes back clutching victory, we can't relinquish the control tower. At the very least, we hold on until Dr. Kal'tsit arrives.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: We—
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Wh—wait, something's cutting the sky apart! Uh, that—whatever that is!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: —Did you hear that! ? It happened again!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...A sword? Right, that Lungmen officer's a sword-wielder, isn't she...
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: C-Could a sword do this?!
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...I'll hold the mercs off outside the control tower. You guys, back in. Rescue the remaining people. Secure an evacuation route that hasn't been destroyed.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: How are you gonna hold alone against that many Sarkaz?
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: I'll go with her.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: You guys, go back in now. Move.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Rhodes doesn't have many left. Tell the other teams to haul the net in. We'll be going this way...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Crash their defensive line ASAP. Their deaths will be our greatest bargaining chips.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Move!
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...Alright!
attributes.name: Tired Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Don't you push it now! They've got a lot of people!
attributes.name: Panicked Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: ...It's been forever. Us two, fighting side by side, eyeing for a chance to ambush the enemy.
attributes.name: Steady Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: The two battle-hardened Operators hold tight their weapons in mutual rapport, and the Sarkazs' press on towards them menacingly.
Neither side takes their eyes off the other.
...For sure.
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: So about your vacation. You two still need a bag-carrier?
attributes.name: Seasoned Rhodes Island Operator
